html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12722018-10-10,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectUnited States Surtax Remission Order
PrecisUNITED STATES SURTAX REMISSION ORDER in order to (1) provide relief from the surtaxes on imports of United States (U.S.) steel and aluminum in exceptional circumstances of short supply to minimize their negative effects on the Canadian economy; (2) provide relief from the surtaxes for boats in situations of pre-existing contractual obligations, and for goods imported temporarily for repair, alteration or storage; and (3) preserve the effectiveness of the surtaxes in targeting imports from the U.S. to encourage a prompt end to U.S. tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum exports.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0205 Publication Date: 2018-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
